name: RËKEÅ: GØTY EDITION
description:
RËKEÅ presents:
At RËKEÅ we believe that there is a Designer in everyone.
So our latest creation empowers you to take creativity into your own hands and to become
the designer you were always meant to be.
Cut, move and glue your way to the furniture of your dreams. 
Based on our iconic designs and your endless imagination.
~enjoy, RËKEÅ

Made during the GGJ 2020
